description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts
lies about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11158.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11106.name: Black Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total balckness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11113.name: White Square

description: The room temperature suddenly intensifies as pitch blackness dominates
your eyes.  Strange demonic figures hang around you almost looking
lifelike..  Or is it?  Several rotting carcasses burn along the room here
giving a horrible smell in the room.  Distant cackles can be heard along the
walls.  Bright fire can be felt as you scan below you.  This is the only way
out.  A NEWLY MADE IMMORTAL SIGN IS HERE FOR YOU TO READ!
11182.name: Descent to

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11103.name: White Square

description: To all of you who risk fighting in here:
Please be aware that mobs here are beyond the levels of 110 and may cast
spells that are beyond mortal powers to cure, some namely as poison,
fire breath, blindness, etc.,  for the price of getting good EQ from here, I
have purposely given spells to these mobs to balance out the process in making
combat tougher.  If you disagree with this, I suggest that you not fight here.
Thank you.
- Tajae
The skies lighten cheerfully as a slight breeze flows about here.
Several cumulus clouds loom here and there but nothing obscure.  Several
birds fly across squwaking in a distance.  A feeling of pleasure and ease is
felt as you ascend here.  A brighter stream of light shines as you gaze your
eyes upward.  Far below you, the chessboard can be seen standing high next
to Westbridge.  AN IMMORTAL-MADE SIGN IS HERE FOR YOU TO READ!
11187.name: High in the Skies

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total balckness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11107.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total balckness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11121.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11133.name: White Square

description: Strange wails of evil laughter and moans haunt the room as you enter.
Several broken tombstones lie about here.  The room is bare, layered only
with stone bricks to provide itself standing around here.  Some badly
rotting away and almost cracked into different bits.  You notice several
pieces of it falling from the ceiling above as if something upon is giving
way to something heavy.  A eerie mist floats about here terrorizing you!
Several piles of decaying bones lie scattered about here..  Almost like a
cemetary of sorts.  You stand paralyzed!  A strange fire is seen below.  A
rope takes you back up to the hot intense heat..  But do you dare try to
climb again?
11185.name: Dark Room

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11125.name: White Square

corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11128.name: Black Square

11154.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11120.name: Black Square

description: Throughout life, talks of heaven and angels and the One have aroused your
curiousity.  As you stand here, the sun glows even brighter than before and
the huge gates before you, is the only thing that prevents yourself and a
life of eternity!  Two guardian angels stand guard beside the gates
approving of those who have chosen to walk in the Light.  Chants of angels
are loudly heard in unison as a harmonious chorus of singing is felt around.
Beyond the gates lies heaven..  And from a distant, you make out a gigantic
throne where possibly the high deity is seated.  Entrance lies to the north
into the gates.  Below you is the quiet realms of the clouds.
11190.name: Before the Gates of Heaven

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.

11151.name: Black Square

11169.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you also notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon tightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.  A stairway is visible at the southwestern
most part of the room.  Where it goes you may never know until you try.
11173.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four

11149.name: Black Square

description: You begin to feel a warm sensation under your feet as you continue
climbing up this long stairway.  Another window can be seen at the wall
beside you.  As you scan outside the tower, you see nothing but the sky
informing you that you've climbed much much higher now.  Possible exits go
up and down the stairs.
11195.name: Higher To the Top

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent

more aware of your surroundings.
11118.name: Black Square

description: You are now standing at the top of the tower where high above you is the
roof with a chandelier--*broken* hanging above you.  Windows can be seen to
your east where distant cumulus clouds flounder about the skies.  A flight
of stairs makes its descent behind you.  The room itself has nothing but a
strange circular carpet on the floor with the face of a certain warrior in
full-clad uniform.
11194.name: Top of the Tower

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.

silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into

11138.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11170.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated into the other
rooms lead into total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what
you'd encounter next.  Into the other rooms lead into total blackness as
your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter next.
11144.name: White Square

description: "Paradise is bliss!  Eternal life is given to those who've travelled in
the Light of day.  Those who have travelled in the darkness may bow down and
repent!  Sinners who refuse to serve the Almighty shall perish in the hands
of the Supreme Being!"
The thunderous voice faintly stops, as a swarm of people from all walks of life
gather about here repenting, praying or praising waiting for the Judgment to
come down upon them.  A blasting beam of light blinds you making visibility
somewhat impaired.  To the south you exit heaven forever!  How will the Almighty
judge you?
11193.name: Heaven!

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11135.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11102.name: Black Square

description: A golden chandelier hangs above the central part of the room.  Strange
mosaic paintings of priests casting spells on hideous monsters furnish the
eastern and western walls here.  The stone surface of the walls and the
ground give it a cave-like atmosphere.  In between the paintings are some
very odd-looking weapons that hang as a use of decoration to give the room a
much pleasant sight.  However, you find the room to be somewhat strange.  A
humongous tapestry with a dragon and a demon is drawn lying on the middle of
the room.  A huge crystal altar with several demonic statues stand aside.  A
strange tiny furnace of blue fire illuminates the front end of the room.  A
small table to provide an altar in worshipping the holy..  Or unholy.  The
room is covered partially with dead carcasses being flamed into bits of
smoldering ashes.  You gasp..  And realize you should leave here.  A rope
leads you out of here into the darkness.  A strange shaft with scorching
flames continue to brighten even more to the bottom.
11183.name: Strange Setting

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts
lies about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11162.name: White Square

11171.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of relief from absolute
darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange black hardened
marble as you notice several blotches your weapon lightly and become more
aware of your surroundings.
11132.name: Black Square

description: As you make your way up this deathly quiet tower, several uncovered
windows can be seen looking outward towards Miden'nir into the thick green
forest.  Westbridge can be seen distantly at the far northeast.  Several
cobwebs build around you but nothing threatening.  The stairs continue up
and down.
11196.name: Climbing the Circulating Stairway

description: As you climb higher upward, the beaming skies emit a dazzling sight.
Solid clouds furnish the ability to walk as you trot along the path here.
Across the east and west of you are colorful glossy windows, each displaying
holy figures of the sacred church.  Holy-engraved banners hang about here as
you wander through this huge outdoor sanctuary.  At the front, a long marble
altar rests with an emblazoned cross in the center.  Statues of holy gods
furnish the background as well as chorus-filled chants illuminating the
lit-up skies.  Several doves scurry here and there as magnificent white
clouds rise high above the giant sanctuary.  Beneath you is a path headed
down to the lands of Waterdeep.  Above you lies a golden ray of ..  Check it
out.
11188.name: Golden Lit Sanctuary in the Skies

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11131.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts
lies about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11156.name: White Square

description: The entire northern wall has been replaced by huge black iron gates!
Beyond the gates is nothing but flames rising high above the ceiling!  Death
is before you!!  As you look behind, you notice several devilish-looking
guards glaring at you as you enter here!  Exits either move up or north into
HELL!
11186.name: Before the Gates of Hell

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11180.name: White Square

11111.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also

11115.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you also notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard from
around leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon tightly and
become more aware of your surroundings.  A strange hot sensation can be felt
under your feet as you stand here.  A fiery ray of something can be seen
below you.
11159.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you also notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard from
around leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon tightly and
become more aware of your surroundings.  To leave the chessboard, you can go
west where the Market Square is seen.
11100.name: Black Square

description: You enter the tower of mysteries.  Apparently, the tower itself was
designed only to ascend upwards providing not much movement in here to move
around.  The only thing visible is a long stairway that takes you up into..
Somewhere.  The only possible exit is out east into the thick forest.
11197.name: Inside the Tower

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.

11110.name: Black Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about along here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11142.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled-floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11164.name: White Square

description: Welcome to your end!  Hell is upon you!  All you can see is blinding
fiery flames rise all the way above you..  Towering upon your mere mortal
presence!  Smoldering coals provide the surface underneath your feet..
Flaming on your poorly-made boots.  There is no escape!  You will die!  As
you wander about here..  You trip over a strange knob of some sort.
11192.name: Prepare to Die!

description: All that is to be seen are high flames burning all about you!  You can
climb your way out of here going up or down to another shaft.  Hurry, the
flames are rampantly scorching furiously towards you!
11184.name: High Flames!

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you also notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard from
around leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon tightly and
become more aware of your surroundings.  As you scan around the room, you
notice a strange light hitting down from above you arousing your curiousity.
What's up there?
11122.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11145.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.

about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11172.name: White Square

next.

next.

next.
11148.name: White Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts
lies about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11146.name: White Square

description: You stand in the back room of the town's storage warehouse.  Apparently
the guys that once were in here playing chess is no longer here on the job.
The room itself seems to be deserted.
11191.name: Back Room of The Warehouse

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11104.name: Black Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11105.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11167.name: Black Square

corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief

11114.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11124.name: Black Square

description: This black square floats completely detached from the rest of the
realms.  Its reason for existing is unknown...
11136.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11155.name: Black Square

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts
lies about here along with splattering marks of blood along the white walls
and the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total blackness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11160.name: White Square

description: With clouds beneath you feet for easy movement, your eyes widen at the
beautiful golden rays that shoot forth everywhere.  Golden statues of angels
and prophets stand along the clouds in a monumental way.  As you scan
around, you notice a strange sensation fill within your body.
A heavenly voice chants, 'FILL WITHIN THE SPIRIT MY CHILD..'
A sanctuary stands far below.  From a distance, you see huge gates above.
11189.name: Peaceful Path Along the Clouds

description: Although the brightness of this room leaves you with some relief, it also
silences the noise into a shivering nothingness.  Decapitated body parts lie
about here along with plattering marks of blood along the white walls and
the hard white marbled floor.  Corridors into the other rooms lead into
total balckness as your heart beats rapidly wondering what you'd encounter
next.
11109.name: White Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11153.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11134.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11147.name: Black Square

description: Obscure darkness overlays the room as you enter.  Perched along the four
corners of the room lies a small torch, each giving off some sense of relief
from absolute darkness.  The surface under your feet is made of a strange
black hardened marble as you notice several blotches of blood recumbent
around you.  Distant battle-cries and shrieks of death can be heard around
leaving you somewhat hesitated as you wield your weapon lightly and become
more aware of your surroundings.
11141.name: Black Square

description: The wraith is hideous-looking and is an undead entity of destruction.  Stand fast and make way if he ever comes to attack your way!
11155.room_name: A fierce-looking wraith is angered by your intrusion!
11155.name: The Wraith of Horror~

description:
He is huge..  He is powerful..  He is very very stocky..  If he charges
you and rams you..  You can consider yourself out of Waterdeep!
11156.room_name: A charging juggernaut runs for you as you enter the room!
11156.name: The Charging Juggernaut~

description: Your eyes cannot make of its presence.. he's invisible!
11157.room_name: You sense movement in the room as a shadow is visible.
11157.name: The Shadow of Hatred~

description: All to see is a pair of glowing eyes about you..
11158.room_name: You stand alert as invisible eyes are watching you!
11158.name: The Eyes of Darkness~

description: She was once a beautiful woman.. now cursed by the Gods.. she lurks within the hideous realms bringing pain to all who stand in her way!
11162.room_name: A hideous snake-like woman slithers here peering into your eyes!
11162.name: The Gorgon Medusa~

description: This fierce two-headed dog.. contains a tough fur-armored shield as a use of defense against its foes.  Stand fast!
11163.room_name: A two-headed canine with large-brown fur growls at you in rage.
11163.name: The Ferocious Two-Headed Chimaera~

description: The creation of Ragnarok!
11164.room_name: Blackthorn, the Lord of Darkness, roars!
11164.name: -Blackthorn-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok.
11165.room_name: The mighty shadowlord of darkness charges you!
11165.name: The Shadowlord of Darkness~

description:
This stout little goblin stands about 5'3" and has the face of a boar.
His chunky fat belly overlaps the armor that he wears from all the past
victims he's been binging on.  His weapons and armor are layered with spots
of blood as well as his whole body.  He snorts loudly at the sight of you
and readys for battle!
11171.room_name: An ugly little goblin-at-arms snorts loudly at you.
11171.name: an ugly goblin warrior~

description:
This frightening creature has the head of a lion, a snake and a goat with
a lethal lashing tail spraying poisonous liquid from it.  Its mighty body is
that of a lion layered with a mane around its neck.  As fearful as this
creature looks it is agile but small, dangerous however.
11172.room_name: A manticore lashes its tail with a sharp *WHAP*!
11172.name: A mischievous manticore~

description:
This entity of invisible abilities wanders here back and forth with only
his fearful-looking eyes visible in your sights.  A stench of mist and
coldness is felt when you peer about in the room feeling the banshee's
presence.
11173.room_name: The banshee of death growls at your intrusion!
11173.name: the banshee of death~

description:
This enormous troll stands at 6'4" and is considered stocky in frame.
His odorizing smell emits a frown as he looks at your direction.  His
ripped-up clothes are covered with stench and his filthiness alone makes you
want to vomit.
11174.room_name: A giant troll exhales nose-damaging body odor as you enter.
11174.name: A giant troll~

description:
This amphibious four-legged creature possesses the power to turn you into
stone with the glareness of his eyes!  His agile quickness allows him to use
his speed as a reinforcement to fights.  His brown-shaded scales have
certain patches of blood about him from past confrontations against those
who fight for good.
11175.room_name: A four-legged basilisk sharpens his eyes on you!
11175.name: the basilisk~

description:
Look up and gaze upon your possible doom!  This monstrous 25 foot high
dragon snarls fumes of fire in his nostrils and is coated heavily with a
thick black material of scales across his body head to tail.  Thunderous
thumps from its footprints leave a constant vibration to your ears as you
peer at him.  His presence alone leaves you with a rapid heartbeat!
11176.room_name: An extremely large, black dragon thunderously roars at you!
11176.name: the black dragon of annihilation ~

description:
The sorceress is enchanted with an evil aura about her.  Her long grey
hair, her evil, left snake eye, those claw-like nails about her hands, those
hideous-shaped teeth, the blackness that surrounds her presence!  What...
What..  What will you do?
11177.room_name: An evil sorceress conjures a spell as you enter.
11177.name: the sorceress of eternal doom~

description:
This horrid-looking thing stand at about 6'0" and is rather thin a normal
hobgoblin.  His oliveish-green skin is all greased up with black sweat as he
roars menacingly at you.  His horned helmet and his shattered chain mail
allows you to do some damage to it.
11178.room_name: A dangerous hobgoblin squats and readys to attack you!
11178.name: a menacing hobgoblin~

description:
He is not to be trusted.  Holy he may look like a priest..  But hardly
someone to listen to.
11183.room_name: A false prophet screams, "WELCOME TO STAGE ONE!"
11183.name: The False Prophet~

description: Here.. allow me for you to meet Death.  Ok.. do you have anything to say to him?
11184.room_name: A strange fellow with a black cloak about him leans on a sickle here!
11184.name: The Grim Reaper~

description:
He stands at about 6'9" and is very pale in skin.  He is wearing all
black and wears gloves for usage of retrieving bloody corpses.  He croaks,
"REST IN PEACE"
11185.room_name: A man stands here beside a grave ready to put you in it!
11185.name: The Undertaker~

description: This tall demonic thing laughs at your puniness.  Evil as he is.. do not take him lightly!
11186.room_name: A large demon is here guarding the entrance to hell!
11186.name: The Demonic Gatekeeper of Hell~

description: The King of Evil.. outcast of Heaven.. the final confrontation!
11187.room_name: A satanic entity of pure EVIL jumps at you!
11187.name: Lucifer, the Tormenter of All~

description: A creation of -+ Ragnarok +-
11188.room_name: A tiny glowing pixie flies about here giving you a mean look!
11188.name: The Black Pixie of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11189.room_name: A swift-moving hyena-like gnoll leaps to attack you down!
11189.name: A Derranged Gnoll~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11190.room_name: A gigantic minotaur of mass destruction looms over you and attacks!
11190.name: The Minotaur of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11191.room_name: A draconian necromancer of hatred roars and attacks!
11191.name: A Majestical Draconian Necromancer of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11192.room_name: A 25 foot high dragon heads for you with its nostrils flared!
11192.name: The Flying Dragon of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11193.room_name: An enormous slithering serpent lunges its fangs for your throat!
11193.name: A Black Anaconda of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11194.room_name: A gargoyle flies about here suddenly descending towards you in combat!
11194.name: The Hideous Gargoyle of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11195.room_name: An evil little drow jumps across your back and attacks!
11195.name: The Drow of Brutal Punishment~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11196.room_name: A man moshes around here as if possessed or derranged and suddenly attacks!
11196.name: A Possessed Man of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11197.room_name: A 25 foot high one-eyed giant makes a crushing entrance and roars!
11197.name: The Mighty Cyclops of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11198.room_name: A feisty little dog swiftly bites for your head!
11198.name: The Dog of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description: A creation of Ragnarok!
11199.room_name: An irritating harpy screams and cackles as she flies for your face!
11199.name: A Ferocious Female Harpy of -+ Ragnarok +-~

description:
You gaze upon a beautiful young warrior with silky golden hair glittering
your eyes.  Her tan skin appears soft and smooth, her height only 5'4",
however, she eyes you sternly at your appearance and smiles momentarily but
places her hands on her weapon as to expect the unexpected from you.
11100.room_name: A beautiful valkyric princess stands here courageously.
11100.name: A valkyrie princess~

description:
This colossal rock-hard plated monster stands here motionless in a pose
holding a huge boulder over him ready to supress any foe that stands in his
way.  Standing at almost seven feet, the golem nods at your arrival but
takes close watch at your every move.
11101.room_name: A humongous stone-bred golem stands here suspended in animation.
11101.name: The monstrous golem~

description:
Bred from the lands of the distant realms, this magnificant four-legged
horse, contently meanders about resting its head in an almost state of
serene drowsiness.  Its long golden horn shines brilliantly over its eyes as
the fluffy wings flap about hastingly but again settles restedly.
11102.room_name: A unicorn wanders about here in a restless manner.
11102.name: a unicorn ~

description:
He seems to be in a hypnotized state.  A sparkling aura surrounds his
large built as he hums some unknown chant leaving you confused by his
actions.  He wears a golden vest with silk baggie trousers and a pony tail
that mysteriously hangs straight up with a shiny sparkle at the tip of the
hair.  His clean-cut image makes you gaze at this divinely specimen of
magical abilities.
11103.room_name: A djinni floats here, eyes closed, indian style.
11103.name: A majestical djinni~

description:
This elderly wizard wears a huge cylindrical hat and a long cloak
designed with moons and stars.  His age shows by his rugged, wrinkled face
and long grey moustache and beard.  However, he seems not bothered by any of
his appearance for he is the wizard and he possesses the powers within.  You
figure maybe he's been smoking too much of something.
11104.room_name: A wizard of holiness is here speaking in tongues glaring at you!
11104.name: The Wizard of Holiness~

description:
You duck swiftly as the phoenix soars right past you flying around the
room in animosity.  This tiny spirited little fellow has orangish- red
feathers with a yellow belly and wields sharp talons and a razor sharp beak.
11105.room_name: A phoenix of life flies around the room squwaking in animosity.
11105.name: The phoenix of life~

description:
This young spirited knight runs around in a rampage in search for evil.
He only stands at 5'5" and is stocky, but possesses mercenary skills adapted
from their mentor whoever he is.  He appears to be on a mission of onslaught
to rid of the world of all evil.  Hmm, what alignment are you?
11116.room_name: A guardian knight wanders about on a mission for war.
11116.name: the guardian knight of protection~

description:
This keen archer possesses the eyes of an owl and the dexterity of a
snake with his bow and arrow.  Draped in all green, this archer strokes his
curly moustache in a cocky way and looks as if he is god-like ..  Or
something like that.
11117.room_name: A Sherwood archer points his bow and arrow straight at you!!
11117.name: An archer of Sherwood~

description:
A giant dirt lifeform rises from the ground standing at about 6'5" and
stands motionless towering high above you.
11118.room_name: Behemoth, the earth elemental, rumbles the ground beneath you.
11118.name: Behemoth~

description:
This liquidated form of elemental floats about in the room here changing
its form into a biped form of ice and stands enormously at about 6'5".  Its
hands used for devastating pound to pound damage on its enemies.  However,
this elemental is content with its nature and uses its powers only in the
situation of self-defense.
11119.room_name: Siren, the water elemental, stands here frozen staring at you.
11119.name: Siren~

description:
Ifrit - the elemental of the air, morphs into a cylindrical whirlwind
filled with dust, air, leaves, and debree.  His contentness allows himself
to breeze by you with a constant peace.  His rage however, intensifies into
a storm of air forbidding you from any possibility of easy combat to it.
11125.room_name: Ifrit, the air elemental, blows by your face.
11125.name: Ifrit ~

description:
This enormous bird-shaped fire emits intense heat as you near her.
Although the beauty of the bird catches you in awe, her abilities with fire
itself signifies to you what she can do when engaged in the heat of battle.
11126.room_name: Firebird, the fire elemental, floats here ablaze in brightness.
11126.name: Firebird~

description: A spirit of holiness, A spirit of watch... a ghost..
11127.room_name: An almost-invisible spirit floats about here with its head bowed.
11127.name: The Spirit of Goodness~

description: You can barely make out his presence.  A ghost.. what did you expect?
11128.room_name: A ghostly figure with a holy cross about him looks at you questionably.
11128.name: The Holy Watcher~

description:
All that you wish to know of holiness..  He..  The priest is contently
looking at you.  Standing at 5'8"..  Skinny frame, and cunningly clever in
the arts of attacks.
11129.room_name: A robed priest stands here glorious in his presence.
11129.name: The Priest of Divinity~

description: He is invisible.. you can't see him.. only when you attack can you.
11130.room_name: An undead ghostly shadow moves about the place.
11130.name: The Holy Spirit~
subroutines:
F for AGV
F par CDEFQV

description:
Tall at about 6'2" 200 pounds even..  Very muscular in size and handsome
in sight.  An aura glows about his presence.  Being an ally of the almighty,
you know that he takes nothing for less.
11131.room_name: A tall muscular angel stands outside the gates here on guard of evil.
11131.name: The Gatekeeper of Heaven~

description:
A cute little guy flies about heaven keeping watch of those who act out
of line.  He looks like a 13 year old..  But take nothing less..  He sides
with the good and hates those who do evil.
11132.room_name: A short angel flaps his wings about the skies watching you.
11132.name: An Angel of Watching~

description: T h e r e  i s  n o  o n e  h i g h e r  t h a n  H e ! ! !  *Not even Nisstyre* heh.
11133.room_name: He, the Almighty, the Divine.. is here!
11133.name: The Resurrector~
